title: Ive been hacked (with proof) Help Get This Guy Banned.
body:
Hello,
Today my opposition midlaner somehow got into my keyboard driver of my Cougar 500K and began to manipulate my keyboard inputs by spamming buttons. This inherently lost me the lane & game. He was laughing about it in game and he apologised at the end of the game about what he did. (Note he was laughing before i said anything.. eg hows your keys).
This was on the Oceanic server. He was the Yasuo named Astaraath. 

Heres a photo of him talking after the game: http://imgur.com/r6uj5CV
Heres the video taken after the game of my keyboard pressing buttons by itself: https://vid.me/1Rn3

replies.body:
Hey there,

I have my doubts it was the player in-game who was doing this, the only way this would be possible would be if you were to download a piece of software from that player.

It sounds to me like you might be infected with malware, from your video i can see you're running Mac OS.

While I don't have much experience with Apple Computers, I can recommend you download [Malwarebytes](https://www.malwarebytes.org/antimalware/mac/) for Mac and run a full scan, remove any threats it finds and reboot.

After the above has completed and any threats have been removed, I would recommend changing all account passwords ASAP as the attacker may have compromised any saved passwords and/or logged your keystrokes while you were logging into any of your accounts.
Riot please help me out here.
They won't and can't do anything. All they process is chat bans after reading one or two words.
